pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with President of Argentina Mauricio Macri | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
The Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, met today with the President of Argentina, Mauricio Macri, in advance of the Nuclear Security Summit in Washington, D.C.

Prime Minister Trudeau commended President Macriâ€™s early efforts to implement his economic reform agenda to promote sustainable economic growth and attract investment.   

The two leaders discussed opportunities to strengthen the bilateral relationship, including in trade and investment, as well as areas for enhanced collaboration, such as clean technology and countering drug trafficking.  The leaders also discussed a wide range of issues of shared interest, such as human rights and democracy, hemispheric security and climate change.
